postContent.contentHtml:
Silhouette of a fisherman casting his net

Project website: Pranjal Dubey Photography

This project is an attempt to document my photography. It's an open source project and you can checkout the source code here.

I chose StencilJS because something about it's design and arch approach really appealed to me. Also I didn't want the overhead of loading a fancy framework in a image heavy website.
postContent.description: An ongoing attempt to document my photography.
postContent.title: Pranjal Dubey Photography

suggestedPosts.description: A tool to create css image filters. Useful for changing colors of SVG icons.
suggestedPosts.title: CSS Filter Generator
